name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Known for its iconic split leaves, Monstera Deliciosa thrives in humid environments and adds a tropical touch to any space.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Fiddle Leaf Fig is a stylish indoor plant with large violin-shaped leaves. It needs bright, indirect light and consistent watering.

name: Snake Plant
description: Snake Plant is low-maintenance and excellent for beginners. It tolerates low light and requires minimal watering.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace Lily produces elegant white blooms and purifies the air. It enjoys moderate light and evenly moist soil.

name: Bonsai Tree
description: Bonsai Tree is a miniature tree requiring detailed pruning and watering. It's a beautiful but demanding decorative plant.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is a succulent with soothing gel inside its leaves. It thrives in sunlight and needs infrequent watering.

name: Areca Palm
description: Areca Palm adds a lush, tropical feel to homes. It grows best in bright light and prefers regular watering during warmer months.

name: Rubber Plant
description: Rubber Plant is a bold houseplant with deep green leaves. It enjoys indirect light and thrives with consistent moisture.

name: Cactus
description: Cactus stores water in its thick stems and thrives in full sun. It’s perfect for dry climates and infrequent watering.

name: Calathea Orbifolia
description: Calathea Orbifolia stands out with large striped leaves. It prefers high humidity and filtered light for healthy growth.

name: Spider Plant
description: Spider Plant is a hardy plant that produces offshoots called 'spiderettes'. It grows well in indirect light and is easy to propagate.

name: Jade Plant
description: Jade Plant symbolizes prosperity and is often used in feng shui. It’s a sun-loving succulent that stores water in its thick leaves.
